text: he mari komana loko! Ajana divase badasahata tamari che, ke a dharati para tame vijayi cho, parantu jo allahano prakopa amara para avi gayo to amari madada karavavalo kona che? Phira'aune kahyum, ke hum to tamane te ja sucana kari rahyo chum, je jo'i rahyo chum ane hum to tamane bhala'ino marga ja batavi rahyo chum
